com.github.moribund.objects.playable

Class PlayableCharacter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.moribund.objects.playable.PlayableCharacter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor, Drawable, Flaggable, Movable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Player

    public abstract class PlayableCharacter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Flaggable, Drawable, Movable, com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor
    The PlayableCharacter interface is a template for a character that can be interacted with by keys. All playable characters are assumed as visible, movable, and an input processor.

        Gets the respective PlayerAction for the Input.Keys value pressed.
        Returns:
